alert.note: Alert for Schleicher (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 16 at 8:14PM CDT until October 16 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL SCHLEICHER COUNTY... At 814 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near The Intersection Of Ranch Road 1828 And Ranch Road 915, or near Eldorado, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Eldorado around 825 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include The Intersection Of Ranch Road 1828 And Ranch Road 915 and The Intersection Of Us-190 And Ranch Road 1828. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
